text: Anne Gwendolyn Craig (born 20 June 1934), known professionally as Wendy Craig, is an English actress. She is best known for her roles in the sitcoms Not in Front of the Children, ...And Mother Makes Three/...And Mother Makes Five and Butterflies. She played the role of Matron in the TV series The Royal (2003â€“2011). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Wendy Craig at the Museum of Broadcast Communications * Wendy Craig's appearance on This Is Your Life Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: Wendy Craig
